title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 March 2017 - XWiki
content:
<systemd> has quit  
00:02 <systemd> has joined #xwiki

10:29 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:20 <faichelbaum> has joined #xwiki  
12:20 <faichelbaum> hi all  
12:23 <evalica> has quit  
12:24 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:24 <evalica> has quit  
12:26 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:27 <faichelbaum> We setup a new xwiki 9.1.2 on our server. Everything runs smoothly (great) except when clicking on a non terminal page on the document tree where it last for 22s, whatever folder we click on, before we get a valid display. any idea ?  
12:30 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
12:30 <evalica> has quit  
12:58 <msmeria> has quit  
12:59 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:01 <floflobel> has quit  
13:32 <evalica1> has quit  
13:32 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
13:39 <sgc072> has quit  
13:39 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
13:41 <faichelbaum> regarding my performance issue (above), the debug log from the monitor points a bunch of hibernate queries (fast but yet a bunch of them). Just for the forlders. Any idea how to optimise this ?  
13:44 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
13:50 <sgc072> has quit  
13:59 <vmassol> faichelbaum: that's weird  
13:59 <vmassol> do you have a very large number of documents or nested levels in your wiki? like several millions?  
14:00 <vmassol> mflorea1 should know better since he worked on optimizing the doc tree not long ago  
14:01 <vmassol> it's as if you're exhibiting the symptoms of before marius's optimizations  
14:05 <acotiuga> has quit  
14:06 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
14:08 <faichelbaum> vmassol: nope  
14:10 <faichelbaum> we have 5 levels in worst case scenario (approx) and below 200 pages (approx)  
14:36 <vmassol> ok so that shouldn't be an issue  
14:36 <vmassol> (otp atm)  
14:43 <faichelbaum> ok but still lost then :(  
14:49 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> has joined #xwiki  
14:53 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> has quit  
14:56 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
15:29 <floflobel> has quit  
15:32 <faichelbaum> @vmassol: on a side note, any idea why I see the spaces with pages within, with the same name, even with "showSpaces="true" showSpaceAsDocument="true" showChildDocuments="false"" in my nav config ?  
15:35 <faichelbaum> no effect following this: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12174  
15:44 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki

23:56 <Alvis> Hi, I'm Alvis from University of Waterloo  
23:56 <Alvis> I'm interested in working with apertus in xwiki this summer  
23:56 <Alvis> Translation in context looks like an interesting task to me  
23:56 <Alvis> Thank you!
